channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Social Like Box and Page by WpDevArt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Social Like Box and Page by WpDevArt

item.title: CVE-2023-0177|2023-02-13T14:32:32.510Z -- unknown -- social%20like%20box%20and%20page%20by%20wpdevart
item.description: The Social Like Box and Page by WpDevArt WordPress plugin before 0.8.41 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
